Nalfeshnee.name: Abominable Sunder
Nalfeshnee.text: The Nalfeshnee glares into your eyes as it disembowels you.

Rakshasa.name: Cunning Ploy
Rakshasa.text: You notice a pile of treasure on the floor and a sharp knife in your back

Storm Giant.name: Maelstrom
Storm Giant.text: Before you can react to the sight of a Storm Giant, a bolt of lightning streaks down through you.

Vampire.name: Entrapped
Vampire.text: You feel your free will leave as you willingly walk to your slaughter.

Ice Devil.name: Black Ice
Ice Devil.text: The Devil stabs you with a frozen lance... but you can't even feel it. Or anything.

Purple Worm.name: Monstrous Devour
Purple Worm.text: You weren't even a noticeable snack.

Marilith.name: Thousand Blades
Marilith.text: In a blinding flash you observe more fresh wounds than you have ever had in your life.

Planetar.name: Unholy Tear
Planetar.text: The Planetar has grabbed hold, and rips you apart one appendage at a time.

Androsphinx.name: Sky Drop
Androsphinx.text: Perhaps next time, a better answer to the riddles three.

Dragon Turtle.name: Dragon Snap
Dragon Turtle.text: The Monstrous creature hardly noticed you were there, much less underfoot.

Balor.name: Demonic Compression
Balor.text: The demon god breaks your mind and breaks your body.

Treasure Goblin.name: Midas Clobber
Treasure Goblin.text: A bag of gold is only great when kinetic energy isn't involved.
